entry.title: WordPress Celestial Aura Theme 任意文件上传漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： WordPress Celestial Aura Theme 任意文件上传漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-26892

漏洞类型： 文件上传

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： WordPress Celestial Aura主题（由dkszone开发）版本2.2及以下存在一个不受限制的文件上传漏洞。低权限认证用户可以通过主题的管理面板上传任意PHP文件，可能导致远程代码执行（RCE）。受影响的文件是wp-admin/admin.php?page=CA-settings，任何认证用户（订阅者及以上）均可利用此漏洞，且没有nonce、文件类型或扩展名验证。

产品厂商： dkszone

产品名称： WordPress Celestial Aura Theme

影响版本： <= 2.2

来源： https://github.com/Nxploited/CVE-2025-26892

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-26892.py
  • LICENSE
  • README.md

原始信息

CVE-2025-26892 – WordPress Celestial Aura Theme <= 2.2 Arbitrary File Upload (Authenticated)

📄 Description

An Unrestricted File Upload vulnerability exists in the WordPress Celestial Aura theme (developed by dkszone) up to version 2.2.
A low-privileged authenticated user can upload arbitrary PHP files through the theme’s admin panel, potentially leading to Remote Code Execution (RCE).

  • Affected theme: Celestial Aura
  • Affected versions: ≤ 2.2
  • Vulnerable file: wp-admin/admin.php?page=CA-settings
  • Exploitable by: Any authenticated user (subscriber and above)
  • No nonce, file type, or extension validation

🛡️ CVSS Score

Patchstack CNA Rating:

  • Base Score: 9.9 (CRITICAL)
  • Vector: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H

🚀 Usage

The script logs in with the provided credentials, uploads a malicious PHP shell (nxploit.php) via the vulnerable theme settings, and prints the direct URL to the uploaded shell.

✅ Successful Exploit Output

⚠️ Disclaimer

This project is for educational and authorized penetration testing purposes only.
Any misuse of this tool is not the responsibility of the author.

漏洞信息

entry.title: Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object Deserialization
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object Deserialization

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49113

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail在1.5.10之前和1.6.x在1.6.11之前的版本中，由于program/actions/settings/upload.php中的_from参数未经过验证，导致存在PHP对象反序列化漏洞，允许认证用户远程执行代码。攻击者可以以Web服务器权限执行任意系统命令。

产品厂商： Roundcube

产品名称： Roundcube Webmail

影响版本： version <= 1.6.10

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/ed643c3bc6ec72588cf57b7b753bb12c0800de96/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Fhttp%2Froundcube_auth_rce_cve_2025_49113.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

entry.title: Yealink 默认用户凭证漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： Yealink 默认用户凭证漏洞

漏洞类型： 弱口令

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： Yealink设备除了默认的admin:admin凭证外，大多数设备还预装了另一个默认用户，用户名和密码均为”user”。虽然此用户非管理员，但仍可用于对设备进行更改。此漏洞可能导致未授权访问或设备配置被修改。

产品厂商： Yealink

产品名称： Yealink devices

搜索语法： Yealink T53W

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12287

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

原始信息

Except for admin:admin, most of the Yealink devices ship with another default user where the username and password is set to “user”. Although this is not an administrator, it can be still used to make changes in the device. I’ve created the following template that checks for this issue:

entry.title: WordPress Nasa Core Plugin 本地文件包含漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： WordPress Nasa Core Plugin 本地文件包含漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-39507

漏洞类型： 文件包含

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： WordPress的Nasa Core插件（版本6.3.2及以下）存在一个本地文件包含漏洞（CVE-2025-39507）。攻击者可以通过操纵文件输入参数来访问服务器上的敏感文件，例如通过构造特定的URL路径（如/index.php?file=../../../../etc/passwd）来尝试读取系统文件。该漏洞源于插件未能正确验证文件输入，导致攻击者可以指定任意路径进行文件包含操作。

产品厂商： WordPress

产品名称： Nasa Core Plugin

影响版本： <= 6.3.2

来源： https://github.com/blackgirlinfosec/cve-lfi-lab

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md

原始信息

🧠 CVE Lab: Tier 1 SOC Analyst Simulation

CVE-2025-39507 | Local File Inclusion in WordPress Nasa Core Plugin

📝 Scenario: A Day in the SOC

It’s a regular Monday. I’m logged into the SOC dashboard, reviewing alerts like usual. One comes in that catches my eye:

ALERT: Possible Local File Inclusion (LFI) Attempt
IP Address: 203.0.113.44
URL: /index.php?file=../../../../etc/passwd
User Agent: curl/7.81.0

It looks like someone might be trying to access system files by manipulating a URL. My job is to look into it and decide if this needs to be escalated.

🔎 Background on the CVE

After some quick research, I found this matches a known vulnerability: CVE-2025-39507. It affects a WordPress plugin called Nasa Core (version 6.3.2 and below). It allows attackers to view sensitive files on the server by changing a file input parameter.

Example:

If the plugin doesn’t validate the file input correctly, it’ll just follow whatever path the attacker gives it.

🛠️ My Tier 1 Investigation

1. Checked the Alert in Sentinel

I didn’t write the detection rule, but I reviewed it to understand what triggered the alert. It looks for things like:

  • URLs with “../” (path traversal)
  • Requests to sensitive files like /etc/passwd or /wp-config.php
  • Scripts or tools in the user agent (like curl or Python)

Here’s a simplified version of the rule:

2. Looked Up the IP Address

I ran a query to see if the IP 203.0.113.44 was trying anything else:

Turns out, it also hit other paths like /admin/, /login.php, and /wp-config.php. That told me this wasn’t just a one-time request — it was probably a scanner or someone doing recon.

3. Checked the Timeline

I checked how long the IP had been active in our logs:

It started a few hours ago and was still active recently. So it wasn’t historical noise — this was ongoing.

4. Escalated to Tier 2

Here’s how I documented it for escalation:

“Possible LFI scan from IP 203.0.113.44. The request pattern matches CVE-2025-39507. IP accessed 9 unique paths including /etc/passwd and wp-config.php using curl. Behavior suggests automated recon. Recommend Tier 2 review and possible IP block.”

📸 Screenshots

#DescriptionFile
1CVE Listing (Patchstack)1_cve_selection_listing.png
2Patchstack Overview2_patchstack_cve_overview.png
3VulDB Vector Example3_vuldb_exploit_vector.png
4Azure Kali VM Created4_kali_vm_deployed.png
5VM Running Screenshot5_kali_vm_running_status.png
6SSH Access to Kali6_kali_vm_logged_in.png
7Sentinel KQL Rule Review7_lfi_detection_kql_query.png

All screenshots are located in the /screenshots folder.

🔁 Reflection

Some questions I asked myself as I worked through this:

  • What signs in the logs made this alert stand out?
  • How can I tell if this is just a scanner or something more serious?
  • What else might happen if this LFI attack actually succeeded?
  • What’s the right balance between alert fatigue and escalation?

🔜 What’s Next – Phase 2

Next, I’ll run a safe simulation of this attack in a controlled lab environment using a platform like TryHackMe. The goal is to better understand what this type of activity looks like from the attacker’s side — and what kind of logs it creates.

⚠️ Disclaimer

This lab was done in a safe, ethical environment for training purposes only. No real systems were targeted or harmed. Always follow your organization’s rules and never test exploits on systems you don’t own or have permission to test.

entry.title: WordPress File Away 任意文件读取漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： WordPress File Away 任意文件读取漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-2539

漏洞类型： 文件读取

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： WordPress插件File Away版本<=3.9.9.0.1存在未认证的任意文件读取漏洞。攻击者可以通过向插件的AJAX端点发送特制请求来读取服务器上的任何文件，如wp-config.php。漏洞源于使用fileaway-stats动作通过admin-ajax.php时的不当nonce验证和路径限制缺失。攻击者可利用此漏洞检索敏感文件并提取凭证，可能导致完全妥协。

产品厂商： WordPress

产品名称： File Away

影响版本： <= 3.9.9.0.1

来源： https://github.com/Yucaerin/CVE-2025-2539

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • mass_cve_2539.py
  • readme.md

原始信息

CVE-2025-2539 - WordPress File Away <= 3.9.9.0.1 - Arbitrary File Read

🔥 Vulnerability Summary
The WordPress plugin File Away version <= 3.9.9.0.1 is vulnerable to an unauthenticated arbitrary file read vulnerability.
This allows attackers to read any file on the server, such as wp-config.php, through a crafted request to the plugin’s AJAX endpoint.

The vulnerability stems from improper nonce validation and lack of path restriction when using the fileaway-stats action via admin-ajax.php.
Attackers can leverage this to retrieve sensitive files and extract credentials, potentially leading to full compromise.

🔍 Affected Plugin

  • Plugin Name: File Away
  • Affected Version: <= 3.9.9.0.1
  • Vulnerability Type: Unauthenticated Arbitrary File Read
  • CVE ID: CVE-2025-2539
  • CVSS Score: 9.1 (Critical)
  • Impact: Sensitive Information Disclosure → Potential RCE (via DB creds + upload)

🧪 Exploit Features

  • 📥 Fetches nonce automatically from the target page
  • 📄 Reads arbitrary file (e.g., wp-config.php)
  • 🔍 Extracts DB credentials (DB_USER, DB_PASSWORD, DB_HOST)
  • ✅ Validates access to /phpmyadmin or /phpMyAdmin
  • 🌐 Attempts remote DB login using retrieved credentials
  • 💾 Stores valid credentials and phpMyAdmin access in:
    • result_database.txt
    • result_phpmyadmin_dan_config_valid.txt
    • result_databaseremotevalid.txt

🧠 Researcher
Credit: https://github.com/RootHarpy/CVE-2025-2539

🚀 Usage
Prepare your list.txt file with a list of target domains (one per line, without http or https).

Example list.txt:

Run the script:

📁 Output

  • result_database.txt → List of extracted DB credentials
  • result_phpmyadmin_and_config_valid.txt → List of phpMyAdmin URLs found
  • result_databaseremotevalid.txt → List of valid remote DB credentials

🔒 Disclaimer:
This tool is intended for educational purposes only and should only be used on systems you own or are explicitly authorized to test. Misuse of this code may lead to legal consequences.

entry.title: Cisco ISE Cloud Credential Sharing Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： Cisco ISE Cloud Credential Sharing Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-20286

漏洞类型： 信息泄露

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Cisco ISE云部署在AWS、Microsoft Azure和Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI)上存在一个严重的凭证生成和授权逻辑缺陷，导致使用相同软件版本的云部署共享相同的凭证。这使得未经认证的远程攻击者能够提取有效凭证并在不同部署间提升权限。

产品厂商： Cisco

产品名称： Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE)

来源： https://github.com/amandanegefa/CVE-2025-20286

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md

原始信息

Zero-Day Expl0it for Cisco ISE Cloud Credential Sharing Vulnerability (CVE-2025-20286)

All materials included in this repository are collected from publicly available sources.

Severity: Critical (CVSS 9.9)

Affected Platforms: Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE) cloud deployments on AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI)

  • Vulnerability Description:
    A critical flaw in the credential generation and authorization logic causes multiple Cisco ISE cloud deployments to share identical credentials when using the same software release on the same cloud platform. This allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to extract valid credentials and escalate privileges across different deployments.

  • Expl0it Capabilities:

    • Remote credential disclosure
    • Limited administrative operations
    • System configuration modification
    • Service disruption

Exploitation Method: Network-based, no prior authentication needed

Stability: Fully developed and tested expl0it with detailed deployment instructions

Disclaimer: Intended for authorized research and penetration testing only; misuse prohibited

This repository will be deleted.

Download

entry.title: Fortinet 缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： Fortinet 缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-32756

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fortinet产品中存在一个严重的基于栈的缓冲区溢出漏洞（CVE-2025-32756），影响FortiVoice、FortiMail、FortiNDR、FortiRecorder和FortiCamera。该漏洞存在于处理/remote/hostcheck_validate端点中的enc参数时，由于边界检查不当导致缓冲区溢出，允许未经身份验证的远程代码执行。

产品厂商： Fortinet

产品名称： FortiVoice, FortiMail, FortiNDR, FortiRecorder, FortiCamera

影响版本： FortiVoice: 1.0.0 < version < 7.2.1, 7.0.7, 6.4.11; FortiMail: 1.0.0 < version < 7.6.3, 7.4.5, 7.2.8, 7.0.9; FortiNDR: 1.0.0 < version < 7.6.1, 7.4.8, 7.2.5, 7.0.7; FortiRecorder: 1.0.0 < version < 7.2.4, 7.0.6, 6.4.6; FortiCamera: 1.0.0 < version < 2.1.4

来源： https://github.com/alm6no5/CVE-2025-32756-POC

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • fortinet_cve_2025_32756_poc.py
  • requirements.txt

原始信息

CVE-2025-32756: Fortinet RCE PoC

A proof-of-concept for the critical stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability (CVE-2025-32756) affecting Fortinet products.

Vulnerability

  • CVSS: 9.8 (Critical)
  • Type: Stack-based buffer overflow in AuthHash cookie processing
  • Impact: Unauthenticated remote code execution
  • Affected Products: FortiVoice, FortiMail, FortiNDR, FortiRecorder, FortiCamera

The vulnerability exists in the processing of the enc parameter in the /remote/hostcheck_validate endpoint, where improper bounds checking allows buffer overflow.

Usage

Arguments:

  • target_ip: Target Fortinet device
  • -p, --port: Target port (default: 443)
  • -d, --debug: Enable debug output

Mitigation

Update to patched versions:

  • FortiVoice: 7.2.1+, 7.0.7+, 6.4.11+
  • FortiMail: 7.6.3+, 7.4.5+, 7.2.8+, 7.0.9+
  • FortiNDR: 7.6.1+, 7.4.8+, 7.2.5+, 7.0.7+
  • FortiRecorder: 7.2.4+, 7.0.6+, 6.4.6+
  • FortiCamera: 2.1.4+

Disclaimer

For educational and research purposes only. Use only against systems you own or have permission to test.

漏洞描述： 在PHPSHE 1.7的include/plugin/payment/alipay/pay.php文件中发现了一个SQL注入漏洞，参数id存在安全问题。该漏洞无需任何认证即可利用。

entry.title: Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object Deserialization
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object Deserialization

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： 2025-49113

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail在1.5.10之前和1.6.x在1.6.11之前的版本中，由于program/actions/settings/upload.php中的_from参数未经验证，导致存在PHP对象反序列化漏洞。攻击者可以通过认证用户执行任意系统命令。

产品厂商： Roundcube

产品名称： Roundcube Webmail

影响版本： version <= 1.6.10

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/01f16ea802a7b73f7a9b62d24cc06489131a130d/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Fhttp%2Froundcube_auth_rce_cve_2025_49113.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues
